mapper.select: SELECT m.*, NVL(cc.coupon_count, 0) AS coupon_count, NVL(wc.wish_list_count, 0) AS wish_list_count FROM ( SELECT * FROM members WHERE member_id=#{member_id} ) m, ( SELECT count(*) AS coupon_count, user_code FROM member_coupon GROUP BY user_code ) cc, ( SELECT count(*) AS wish_list_count, list_writer_code FROM wish_list GROUP BY list_writer_code ) wc WHERE m.member_code=cc.user_code(+) AND m.member_code=wc.list_writer_code(+)
